responseTexts: Leaving me in here alone with Hugh Jass, huh?
Leaving me with Hugh and his thousand-yard stare? Don’t worry, I’ll keep him company. He likes... silence.
Go on, enjoy your freedom while it lasts. If you hear a scream, don’t worry, it’s just me going insane from all this *purity.*
Don’t be shy, darling. If my body offends you, I’m sure Hugh’s soul-crushed face will balance the mood.
